name: Pollen (doom4e)
description:
Team: Achoo
Created by: Milan Petrovski
Submission to 2020 Unreal Spring GameJam

Oh snap, is it spring already?  *intense sniff.
Snow is melting, you need to help Miki clear his garden from flowers and trees that are growing before pollen allergy drains him, JUST DON'T OVERDOSE ON THOSE LORATADINES!!!

CONTROLS:

WASD - MOVE
Left Click - Hit/Shoot
1 - Select Scythe
2 - Select Axe
3 - Select EXTERMINATOR 3000
4 - Select Pollen Scanner

GAMEPLAY MECHANICS:

1. Winter/Spring 
Areas affected by spring bloom are doing damage to you, so try to avoid them, or clear them before your allergy gets stronger.
!!!Don't forget, flowers are always growing in spring!!!

2. Weapons
 SCTYHE - Use Scythe to cut flowers and grass or do damage to bees
 AXE -  Use Axe to cut trees or do damage to bees
 EXTERMINATOR 3000 -  Exterminator is your best ally against fighting against bees, and it can help you take on more than 1 at a time.
 POLLEN SCANNER - Use your Pollen Scanner If you can't find that sneaky flower or tree. (after selected, you have to click left mouse button for it to show the way)

3. Loratadine
Best friend in tough times, it can stop nose from running or you from sneezing, but be careful drinking more than one in 7 seconds, weakens the effect of the next and makes you sleepy (trust me i know this from experience). 3 of them at once, and they have no effect on you anymore.

4. Bees
You are taking their food, so be careful they can swarm you and do significant damage, even if you survive the attack.
